Actions.Text: REFERRED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION
REFERRED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION

Title: Prohibits the housing of migrants in schoolhouses or on such grounds
Summary: Prohibits the housing of migrants in schoolhouses or on such grounds in the New York City community school district system.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to prohibiting the housing of migrants in schoolhouses or on such grounds
